sqlMap.select: SELECT CD, CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000119' AND CD != '000000000' ORDER BY CD
SELECT CD, CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000128' AND CD != '000000000' ORDER BY CD
SELECT A.DPT_CD AS CD, A.DPT_NM AS CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM002M A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A.DPT_CD NOT LIKE '%0000' OR A.DPT_CD IN ('110000','120000')) ORDER BY DPT_CD

SELECT A.ORG_TYPE_CD, A.ORG_CD, (SELECT B.CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C B WHERE B.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000128' AND B.CD = C.PUB_DVSN_CD) AS ORG_TYPE_NM2, D.CD_NM as ORG_TYPE_NM, C.ORG_NM, C.TNB AS ORG_TEL, C.AD FROM TBFAAAEA033M A, TBDCMACM015M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE 1=1 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000119' AND A.ORG_TYPE_CD = D.CD AND A.ORG_CD = C.ORG_CD AND C.USE_DVSN_NO = 'Y'
AND A.ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOffcDiv#
AND C.PUB_DVSN_CD = #strOrgDiv#
AND C.ENFM_DPT_CD = #strEnfmDptCd#
AND (SUBSTR(C.COPT_SG_CD,0,3) = SUBSTR(#strCoptOrgCd#,0,3) OR A.ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE SUBSTR(ORG_CD,0,3) = SUBSTR(#strCoptOrgCd#,1,3)))
AND A.ORG_CD = #strCoptOrgCd#
ORDER BY A.ORG_TYPE_CD, A.ORG_CD
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TBFAAAEA033M WHERE ORG_CD = #strCoptOrgCd# AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgDiv#

SELECT TO_CHAR(ROWNUM) AS NUM1, CD_NM, ORG_NM, ORG_NM2, ORG_DGE_CD, TNB, AD, PUB_DVSN_CD FROM ( SELECT D.CD_NM , C.ORG_NM, C.ORG_NM AS ORG_NM2, C.ORG_DGE_CD||'차' AS ORG_DGE_CD, C.TNB, C.AD , (SELECT B.CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C B WHERE B.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000128' AND B.CD = C.PUB_DVSN_CD) AS PUB_DVSN_CD FROM TBFAAAEA033M A, TBDCMACM015M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE 1=1 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000119' AND A.ORG_TYPE_CD = D.CD AND A.ORG_CD = C.ORG_CD AND C.USE_DVSN_NO = 'Y'
AND A.ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOffcDiv#
AND C.PUB_DVSN_CD = #strOrgDiv#
AND C.ENFM_DPT_CD = #strEnfmDptCd#
AND (SUBSTR(C.COPT_SG_CD,0,3) = SUBSTR(#strCoptOrgCd#,0,3) OR A.ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE SUBSTR(ORG_CD,0,3) = SUBSTR(#strCoptOrgCd#,1,3)))
AND A.ORG_CD = #strCoptOrgCd#
ORDER BY A.ORG_TYPE_CD, A.ORG_CD ) M1;
SELECT SUBSTR(ORG_CD,1,3) AS ORG_CD, ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE SUBSTR(ORG_CD,1,3) = (SELECT A.COPT_SG_CD FROM TBDCMACM015M A WHERE A.ORG_CD = #strCoptOrgCd#) AND ORG_DGE_CD = '1'
SELECT BZN AS ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE ORG_CD = #strCoptOrgCd#
SELECT CD, CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND CD != '000000000' ORDER BY CD
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBFAAAEA033M ( ORG_TYPE_CD, /* 기관구분코드 */ ORG_CD, /* 기관명 */ RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD, /* 최고책임자직급 */ RESPON_PSON_POSLOC_NM, /* 최고책임자직위 */ STAFF_CNT1, /* 직원수1 */ STAFF_CNT2, /* 직원수2 */ STAFF_CNT3, /* 직원수3 */ SUB_ORG_CNT1, /* 하위기관수1 */ SUB_ORG_CNT2, /* 하위기관수2 */ ORG_RPSV_NM, /* 기관대표자명 */ ESTABLISH_DATE, /* 설립일 */ AUDIT_CNT, /* 감사인원수 */ LAW_BAS1, /* 법적근거1 */ LAW_BAS2, /* 법적근거2 */ CAPITAL_TYPE_CD, /* 자본금구분코드 */ CAPITAL_AMT, /* 자본금 */ UNIT_NM, /* 화폐단위명 */ GRT_PER, /* 보증기간 */ GRT_END_PER, /* 보증종료기간 */ GRT_RMK, /* 보증비고 */ GRT_SUB_ORG_CD, /* 기금보조기관코드 */ REG_DTIME, /* 등록일시 */ REG_PSON_ID, /* 등록자ID */ BIB_ETC, /* 총람비고 */ CHRG_DEPT_NM, /* 담당부서명 */ TEL /* 담당전화번호 */ ) VALUES ( #ORG_TYPE_CD#, #ORG_CD#, #RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD#, #RESPON_PSON_POSLOC_NM#, #STAFF_CNT1#, #STAFF_CNT2#, #STAFF_CNT3#, #SUB_ORG_CNT1#, #SUB_ORG_CNT2#, #ORG_RPSV_NM#, #ESTABLISH_DATE#, #AUDIT_CNT#, #LAW_BAS1#, #LAW_BAS2#, #CAPITAL_TYPE_CD#, #CAPITAL_AMT#, #UNIT_NM#, #GRT_PER#, #GRT_END_PER#, #GRT_RMK#, #GRT_SUB_ORG_CD#, #REG_DTIME#, #REG_PSON_ID#, #BIB_ETC#, #CHRG_DEPT_NM#, #TEL# )

INSERT INTO TBFAAAEA034M ( ORG_TYPE_CD, /* 기관구분코드 */ ORG_CD, /* 기관코드 */ SEQ, /* 연번 */ GEN_TEL, /* 일반전화번호 */ ADMIN_TEL, /* 행정전화번호 */ DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM, /* 부서담당자명 */ AUD_DEPT_NM, /* 감사부서명 */ DIVDT_BIZ_NM, /* 분장사무명 */ DEPT_ETC, /* 부서기타 */ DEPT_PSON_CNT, /* 부서인원수 */ REG_DTIME, /* 등록일시 */ REG_PSON_ID /* 등록자ID */ ) VALUES ( #ORG_TYPE_CD#, #ORG_CD#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBFAAAEA034M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#), #GEN_TEL#, #ADMIN_TEL#, #DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM#, #AUD_DEPT_NM#, #DIVDT_BIZ_NM#, #DEPT_ETC#, #AUDIT_CNT#, SYSDATE, #FNL_USR_ID# )

INSERT INTO TBFAAAEA035M ( ORG_TYPE_CD, /* 기관구분코드 */ ORG_CD, /* 기관코드 */ SEQ, /* 연번 */ YEAR, /* 년도 */ CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD, /* 출연형태코드 */ SUBSIDY_AMT /* 보조금 */ ) VALUES ( #ORG_TYPE_CD#, #ORG_CD#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBFAAAEA035M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#), #YEAR#, #CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD#, #SUBSIDY_AMT# )

INSERT INTO TBFAAAEA037M ( ORG_TYPE_CD, /* 기관구분코드 */ ORG_CD, /* 기관코드 */ SEQ, /* 연번 */ ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD, /* 기관차수구분코드 */ SUB_ORG_TYPE_NM, /* 산하기관종류명 */ SUB_ORG_PSON_CNT, /* 산하기관인원수 */ SUB_ORG_CNT /* 산하기관수 */ ) VALUES ( #ORG_TYPE_CD#, #ORG_CD#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBFAAAEA037M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#), #ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD#, #SUB_ORG_TYPE_NM#, #SUB_ORG_PSON_CNT#, #SUB_ORG_CNT# )

INSERT INTO TBFAAAEA038M ( ORG_TYPE_CD, /* 기관구분코드 */ ORG_CD, /* 기관코드 */ SEQ, /* 연번 */ NVESTOR_NM, /* 출자비명 */ INVEST_RATE /* 출자비율 */ ) VALUES ( #ORG_TYPE_CD#, #ORG_CD#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBFAAAEA038M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#), #NVESTOR_NM#, #INVEST_RATE# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.ORG_NM||' ('||A.ORG_CD||')' AS ORG_CD_NM ,ORG_DGE_CD||'차' AS ORG_DGE_NM ,(SELECT ORG_NM||' ('||SUBSTR(ORG_CD,1,3)||')' FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE ORG_CD = B.COPT_SG_CD||'000000000' AND USE_DVSN_NO ='Y') AS COPT_ORG_CD_NM ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = A.ORG_TYPE_CD AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000119')||' ('||A.ORG_TYPE_CD||')' AS ORG_TYPE_CD_NM ,(SELECT DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD = B.ENFM_DPT_CD)||' ('||B.ENFM_DPT_CD||')' AS ENFM_DPT_CD_NM ,B.AD||' '||B.DTL_AD AS ADDR ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = B.PUB_DVSN_CD AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000128')||' ('||B.PUB_DVSN_CD||')' AS PUB_DVSN_CD_NM ,A.ORG_CD ,B.ORG_NM ,B.ORG_DGE_CD ,SUBSTR(A.ORG_CD,1,3) AS COPT_ORG_CD ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = A.ORG_TYPE_CD AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000119') AS ORG_TYPE_NM ,A.ORG_TYPE_CD ,(SELECT ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM015M WHERE ORG_CD = SUBSTR(A.ORG_CD,1,3)||'000000000') AS COPT_ORG_NM ,B.BZN ,B.ENFM_DPT_CD ,(SELECT DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M WHERE DPT_CD = B.ENFM_DPT_CD) AS ENFM_DPT_NM ,B.ZCD ,B.ZCD AS ZNM ,A.STAFF_CNT1 ,A.STAFF_CNT1||'명' AS STAFF_CNT1_NM ,A.STAFF_CNT2 ,A.STAFF_CNT3 ,A.SUB_ORG_CNT1 ,A.SUB_ORG_CNT2 ,A.ORG_RPSV_NM ,A.ESTABLISH_DATE ,B.AD ,B.DTL_AD ,B.TNB AS ORG_TEL ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(A.RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD,'000'),'999'),'3','0') AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173') AS RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD_NM ,LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(A.RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD,'000'),'999'),'3','0') AS RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD ,A.RESPON_PSON_POSLOC_NM ,A.AUDIT_CNT ,A.AUDIT_CNT||'명' AS AUDIT_CNT_NM ,A.LAW_BAS1 ,A.LAW_BAS2 ,A.CAPITAL_TYPE_CD ,A.CAPITAL_AMT ,A.UNIT_NM ,A.GRT_PER ,A.GRT_END_PER ,A.GRT_RMK ,A.GRT_SUB_ORG_CD ,(select ORG_NM from TBDCMACM015M where ORG_CD = A.GRT_SUB_ORG_CD) GRT_SUB_ORG_NM ,A.TEL ,A.CHRG_DEPT_NM ,B.PUB_DVSN_CD ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = B.PUB_DVSN_CD AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000128') AS ORG_TYPE_NM2 ,A.REG_DTIME ,A.REG_PSON_ID ,A.BIB_ETC ,A.ORG_RPSV_NM||'/'||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ESTABLISH_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORG_PRSV_NM_ESTABLISH_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ESTABLISH_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESTABLISH_DATE2 ,A.CAPITAL_AMT||' 백만원' AS CAPITAL_AMT2 FROM TBFAAAEA033M A, TBDCMACM015M B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND A.ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#

SELECT ORG_TYPE_CD, ORG_CD, SEQ, GEN_TEL, ADMIN_TEL, DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM, AUD_DEPT_NM, DIVDT_BIZ_NM, DEPT_ETC, DEPT_PSON_CNT FROM TBFAAAEA034M WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#

SELECT ORG_TYPE_CD, ORG_CD, SEQ, YEAR, CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD, SUBSIDY_AMT, (SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CD = LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD,'000'),'999'),'2','0') AND CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000230')||' ('||LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD,'000'),'999'),'2','0')||')' AS CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD_NM FROM TBFAAAEA035M WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd# ORDER BY YEAR

SELECT ORG_TYPE_CD, ORG_CD, SEQ, YEAR, CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD, SUBSIDY_AMT, (SELECT A.CD_NM FROM TBDCMACM013C A WHERE A.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000201' AND LPAD(A.CD,'2','0') = CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD)||' ('||CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD||') ' AS CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD_NM FROM TBFAAAEA035M WHERE 1=1 AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd# ORDER BY YEAR

SELECT ORG_TYPE_CD, ORG_CD, SEQ, ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD, ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD||'차기관' AS ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD_NM, SUB_ORG_TYPE_NM, SUB_ORG_PSON_CNT, SUB_ORG_CNT FROM TBFAAAEA037M WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
SELECT ORG_TYPE_CD, ORG_CD, SEQ, NVESTOR_NM, INVEST_RATE FROM TBFAAAEA038M WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBFAAAEA033M SET RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD = #RESPON_PSON_POS_CLASS_CD# ,RESPON_PSON_POSLOC_NM = #RESPON_PSON_POSLOC_NM# ,STAFF_CNT1 = #STAFF_CNT1# ,STAFF_CNT2 = #STAFF_CNT2# ,STAFF_CNT3 = #STAFF_CNT3# ,SUB_ORG_CNT1 = #SUB_ORG_CNT1# ,SUB_ORG_CNT2 = #SUB_ORG_CNT2# ,ORG_RPSV_NM = #ORG_RPSV_NM# ,ESTABLISH_DATE = #ESTABLISH_DATE# ,AUDIT_CNT = #AUDIT_CNT# ,LAW_BAS1 = #LAW_BAS1# ,LAW_BAS2 = #LAW_BAS2# ,CAPITAL_TYPE_CD = #CAPITAL_TYPE_CD# ,CAPITAL_AMT = #CAPITAL_AMT# ,UNIT_NM = #UNIT_NM# ,GRT_PER = #GRT_PER# ,GRT_END_PER = #GRT_END_PER# ,GRT_RMK = #GRT_RMK# ,GRT_SUB_ORG_CD = #GRT_SUB_ORG_CD# ,REG_DTIME = #REG_DTIME# ,REG_PSON_ID = #REG_PSON_ID# ,BIB_ETC = #BIB_ETC# ,CHRG_DEPT_NM = #CHRG_DEPT_NM# ,TEL = #TEL# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#

UPDATE TBFAAAEA034M SET GEN_TEL = #GEN_TEL# ,ADMIN_TEL = #ADMIN_TEL# ,DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM = #DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM# ,AUD_DEPT_NM = #AUD_DEPT_NM# ,DIVDT_BIZ_NM = #DIVDT_BIZ_NM# ,DEPT_ETC = #DEPT_ETC# ,DEPT_PSON_CNT = #DEPT_PSON_CNT# ,REG_DTIME = #REG_DTIME# ,REG_PSON_ID = #REG_PSON_ID# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

UPDATE TBFAAAEA035M SET YEAR = #YEAR# ,CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD = #CONTRIBUTE_TYPE_CD# ,SUBSIDY_AMT = #SUBSIDY_AMT# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

UPDATE TBFAAAEA037M SET ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD = #ORG_DEGREE_TYPE_CD# ,SUB_ORG_TYPE_NM = #SUB_ORG_TYPE_NM# ,SUB_ORG_PSON_CNT = #SUB_ORG_PSON_CNT# ,SUB_ORG_CNT = #SUB_ORG_CNT# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

UPDATE TBFAAAEA038M SET NVESTOR_NM = #NVESTOR_NM# ,INVEST_RATE = #INVEST_RATE# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#
UPDATE TBDCMACM015M SET TNB = #TNB# ,ZCD = #ZCD# ,BZN = #BZN# ,AD = #AD# ,DTL_AD = #DTL_AD# WHERE ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA033M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#

DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA034M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA035M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA037M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#

DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA038M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
AND SEQ = #SEQ#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CD, CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000231' AND CD != '000000000' ORDER BY CD
SELECT CD, CD_NM, USE_YN FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000230' AND CD != '000000000' ORDER BY CD
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA037M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA038M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA034M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA034M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA035M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA037M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
DELETE FROM TBFAAAEA038M WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #strOrgTypeCd# AND ORG_CD = #strOrgCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBFAAAEA034M SET GEN_TEL = #GEN_TEL# ,ADMIN_TEL = #ADMIN_TEL# ,DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM = #DEPT_CHRG_PSON_NM# ,AUD_DEPT_NM = #AUD_DEPT_NM# ,DIVDT_BIZ_NM = #DIVDT_BIZ_NM# ,DEPT_ETC = #DEPT_ETC# ,DEPT_PSON_CNT = #DEPT_PSON_CNT# ,REG_DTIME = #REG_DTIME# ,REG_PSON_ID = #REG_PSON_ID# WHERE ORG_TYPE_CD = #ORG_TYPE_CD# AND ORG_CD = #ORG_CD# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
UPDATE TBDCMACM015M SET TNB = #ORG_TEL# ,ZCD = #ZCD# ,AD = #AD# ,DTL_AD = #DTL_AD# ,ROAD_NM_AD = #AD# ,ROAD_NM_DTL_AD = #DTL_AD# ,BZN = #BZN# WHERE ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#
